definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Have the stylist dry your hair completely.
sentences.chinese: 让理发师把你的头发完全吹干。

sentences.english: She combed it and then blow-dried it.
sentences.chinese: 她梳理好我的头发，把它们吹干。

sentences.english: The hairdresser is drying his hair with the hairdryer.
sentences.chinese: 理发师在用吹风机给自己吹干头发。

sentences.english: The strip then is dried in dryer by hot blast.
sentences.chinese: 最后经挤干进入热风吹干装置。

sentences.english: Stick out the tongue and blow it by a hair dryer.
sentences.chinese: 把舌头伸出来用吹风筒吹干。

sentences.english: Dry hands with an air dryer, disposable paper towel or personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 用吹风机，一次性纸巾或者个人毛巾把手吹干。

sentences.english: Section your bangs when your hair is wet before blow-drying.
sentences.chinese: 打湿刘海，在吹干前分好。

sentences.english: The seat goes back into the wall where it is washed and blow-dried.
sentences.chinese: 使用后马桶会缩进墙里，并在那里洗净吹干。

sentences.english: I dry my hair with an electric hair drier after washing hair.
sentences.chinese: 我洗完头用吹风机吹干头发。

sentences.english: Start blowing air into the bag with the hair dryer.
sentences.chinese: 我洗完头用吹风机吹干头发。

sentences.english: Ask the hairdresser for a wash and blow-dry.
sentences.chinese: 要求理发师洗头并吹干定型。

sentences.english: Conditioning and a blow-dry add another five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 如需加上护发素以及吹干则要再加上五分钟。

sentences.english: A bone wave-whitened and dried in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 一根被海浪洗白被海风吹干的骨头。

sentences.english: Can you quickly use the hairdryer to dry my hair?
sentences.chinese: 你可以快速的用吹风机吹干我的头发吗？

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
